content: boomerang shape a name my husband coined to describe linen weave boomerang /patterns/library/linen-weave-boomerang and which i ve stuck with for this shape big needles for an ultra fluffy texture and to make the yarn go further designed specifically with lace-weight mohair in mind make a small kerchief size about 125cm - 4 long with just 25g half a skein of the rowan yarn or a single skein of the lang mohair - great little luxury gift or use up to double that amount for a huge fluffy cloud of a scarf the size you see in photo #4 was made with 35g 300m/330yds and is about 170cm/68 long i stopped because that was big enough for me but you can keep going for an even longer one photo #2 shows the kerchief size it was taken at 23g **you can actually make this with any yarn but mohair was used for the original ones**
